page.title: 20THE PROJECT
page.content:
We hope that you have enjoyed these pages about life in our area.It proved to take much more time than we had thought. We started by going out in small groups with a parent, and visiting the farms in the district. With the help of the farmer we completed a questionaire, and from the answers compiled all the pages on farming. Then we split into twos or threes to complete the rest of the pages. We found it very enjoyable, especially making and arranging the visits, and writing the text into the computer. We only got the computer at the start of the project so using it was an exciting new experience.
The Junior Class.(29 children, aged 7 to 11). Egloskerry C.P. School. Summer and Autumn term, 1985.
